item.title: Code Generation from csv file with .NET
item.author: Oliver Vea
item.description: Setting the stage Recently, I’ve been developing a game with RPG elements. Naturally, this means that there are hundreds of stat values for abilities, characters, items, enemies, and so on. In the world of game development it can be a good idea to store this kind of data in spreadsheets as it allows for versatile access to the values for analysis, tuning and easy extension. Without source generation, csv files have significant downsides.
